justification: The portfolio is constructed by selecting ETFs with strong bullish momentum and potential for short-term gains, focusing on those with high RSI indicating overbought conditions but supported by positive MACD and EMA trends. Specifically, QQQ.O and VONG.O show the highest RSI and consistent EMA levels, suggesting strong upward momentum, while XLE.P is included as a contrarian play due to its oversold RSI and potential for rebound, with weights allocated based on confidence in their continued performance.

I selected ETFs with strong bullish momentum and trend strength, focusing on those with high RSI indicating overbought conditions but supported by positive MACD histograms and rising MACD lines, such as SPYG.P, VONG.O, and IJK.P, while avoiding those with negative MACD or weak signals to maximize short-term PnL.

The portfolio is concentrated in ETFs with strong bullish momentum signals, including QQQ.O and XLK.P which exhibit positive MACD lines above their signals and high RSI indicating strong uptrends, and XLU.P which shows a high MACD line and positive trend. These selections are based on the highest combined scores from trend strength and momentum indicators to maximize short-term PnL.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals: IJK.P and IJS.P exhibit high MACD histogram values (1.373 and 1.716) and positive MACD lines, indicating robust upward trends, while QQQ.O shows a high RSI (72.075) but strong MACD line (1.973) supporting continued momentum. Weights are allocated to maximize exposure to these high-conviction assets.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals: QQQ.O and VUG.P show high RSI and positive MACD histograms indicating strong uptrends, while XLK.P and XLU.P exhibit positive MACD lines and histograms with high RSI for sustained momentum, and SPYG.P has a positive MACD histogram and high RSI supporting growth potential.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals: IBB.O shows a high MACD histogram and rising RSI, indicating strong upward trend; PPH.O has a positive MACD histogram and high RSI near overbought, suggesting continued strength; XLV.P exhibits a positive MACD histogram and high RSI, supporting momentum; XRT.P displays a positive MACD histogram and neutral RSI, indicating potential reversal; and XLF.P has a positive MACD histogram and moderate RSI, offering balanced momentum. Weights are allocated to maximize exposure to these high-conviction signals.

The portfolio is constructed based on strong bullish momentum signals: QQQ.O and XLK.P show high MACD histogram values and positive MACD lines, indicating strong upward trends, while SPY.P and XLY.P have positive MACD histograms and RSI in bullish ranges, supporting continued gains. VONG.O is included for its solid MACD and RSI momentum, diversifying across sectors.
